6// NameEmbeddedUniformStructsMetal: Gives nameless uniform struct internal names.
7//
8
9#include "compiler/translator/TranslatorMetalDirect/NameEmbeddedUniformStructsMetal.h"
10
11#include "compiler/translator/SymbolTable.h"
12#include "compiler/translator/tree_util/IntermTraverse.h"
13
14namespace sh
15{
16namespace
17{
18// This traverser translates embedded uniform structs into a specifier and declaration.
19// This makes the declarations easier to move into uniform blocks.
20class Traverser : public TIntermTraverser
21{
22
23 public:
24 std::unordered_map<int, TIntermSymbol *> replacements;
25 explicit Traverser(TSymbolTable *symbolTable)
26 : TIntermTraverser(true, false, false, symbolTable)
27 {
28
29 }
30
31 bool visitDeclaration(Visit visit, TIntermDeclaration *decl) override
32 {
33 ASSERT(visit == PreVisit);
34
35 if (!mInGlobalScope)
36 {
37 return false;
38 }
39
40 const TIntermSequence &sequence = *(decl->getSequence());
41 ASSERT(sequence.size() == 1);
42 TIntermTyped *declarator = sequence.front()->getAsTyped();
43 const TType &type = declarator->getType();
44
45 if (type.isStructSpecifier() && type.getQualifier() == EvqUniform)
46 {
47 const TStructure *structure = type.getStruct();
48
49 if (structure->symbolType() == SymbolType::Empty)
50 {
51 doReplacement(decl, declarator, structure);
52 }
53 }
54
55 return false;
56 }
57 void visitSymbol(TIntermSymbol *decl) override
58 {
59 auto symbol = replacements.find(decl->uniqueId().get());
60 if(symbol != replacements.end())
61 {
62 queueReplacement(symbol->second->deepCopy(), OriginalNode::IS_DROPPED);
63 }
64 }
65
66 private:
67 void doReplacement(TIntermDeclaration *decl,
68 TIntermTyped *declarator,
69 const TStructure *oldStructure)
70 {
71 // struct <structName> { ... };
72 TStructure *structure = new TStructure(mSymbolTable, kEmptyImmutableString,
73 &oldStructure->fields(), SymbolType::AngleInternal);
74 TType *namedType = new TType(structure, true);
75 namedType->setQualifier(EvqGlobal);
76
77 TVariable *structVariable =
78 new TVariable(mSymbolTable, kEmptyImmutableString, namedType, SymbolType::Empty);
79 TIntermSymbol *structDeclarator = new TIntermSymbol(structVariable);
80 TIntermDeclaration *structDeclaration = new TIntermDeclaration;
81 structDeclaration->appendDeclarator(structDeclarator);
82
83 TIntermSequence *newSequence = new TIntermSequence;
84 newSequence->push_back(structDeclaration);
85
86 // uniform <structName> <structUniformName>;
87 TIntermSymbol *asSymbol = declarator->getAsSymbolNode();
88 if (asSymbol && asSymbol->variable().symbolType() != SymbolType::Empty)
89 {
90 TIntermDeclaration *namedDecl = new TIntermDeclaration;
91 TType *uniformType = new TType(structure, false);
92 uniformType->setQualifier(EvqUniform);
93
94 TVariable *newVar = new TVariable(mSymbolTable, asSymbol->getName(), uniformType,
95 asSymbol->variable().symbolType());
96 TIntermSymbol *newSymbol = new TIntermSymbol(newVar);
97 replacements[asSymbol->uniqueId().get()] = newSymbol;
98 namedDecl->appendDeclarator(newSymbol);
99
100 newSequence->push_back(namedDecl);
101 }
102
103 mMultiReplacements.emplace_back(getParentNode()->getAsBlock(), decl, *newSequence);
104 }
105};
106} // anonymous namespace
107
108bool NameEmbeddedStructUniformsMetal(TCompiler *compiler, TIntermBlock *root, TSymbolTable *symbolTable)
109{
110 Traverser nameStructs(symbolTable);
111 root->traverse(&nameStructs);
112 return nameStructs.updateTree(compiler, root);
113}
114} // namespace sh
115
